E000: Fuser did not heat up. Lamp, thermal switch, thermistors, connections, AC driver, DC controller, SSR, etc.
Fuser temperature too high. Same possibilities as E000, as well as shorted wire.
Fuser temperature not rising at correct pace. Same possibilities as E000
Fuser temperature drops. Same as E003.
Fuser problem. AC driver, SSR bad, wire shorted.
Drive problem. Main motor, gears, etc.
Composite power board or DC controller.
Composite power board or DC controller.
Scan motor or scan sensor problem. Panel locked with no code. Scan motor problem.
Exposure lamp or exposure lamp regulator board.
DC controller or composite power supply problem.
RDF Pickup motor or pick up sensor.
RDF feed motor or pulse sensor.
RDF tray sensor or registration sensor.
Sorter main board or communication with copier.
Jogger side plate sensor or motor.
